level.heading: AGENCY ALLOCATION LETTER FOR SMALL BUSINESS ENTERPRISES (ยง 27-831)

level.text: 831.1 The Department shall provide an agency allocation letter to each agencywo (2) months prior to the beginning of each fiscal year that details theollowing:
The fiscal year for which the agency is submitting the allocation letter;
The budget of the agency approved by Council for the fiscal year;
The expendable budget of the agency for the fiscal year; and
The agency’s SBE expected minimum expenditures for the fiscal year.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9052 (December 4, 1992); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8439 (October 23, 2009),ncorporating by reference text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 5622,644 (July 10, 2009).
